other_tests.findings: Small (1.5 cm) and heterogeneous echo-texture of both testes. Absent flow in the testicular veins with central echoes and prominent vessel dilatation consistent with bilateral venous thromboses.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Substantial improvement in potency and libido with depot testosterone after starting therapy.

other_tests.procedure_name: Luteinising hormone and follicular stimulating hormone testing
other_tests.findings: High luteinising hormone (25.1 IU/L) and follicle stimulating hormone (43 IU/L); low serum testosterone (7.9 nmol/L).

other_tests.procedure_name: Heterozygous factor V Leiden mutation testing
other_tests.findings: Re-confirmed presence of heterozygous factor V Leiden mutation with absence of other concurrent thrombophilias.
